metadata.title: CVE-2015-9099 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The lame_init_params function in lame.c in libmp3lame.a in LAME 3.99.5allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read andapplication crash) via a crafted audio file with a negative sample rate.

criterions.comment: lame: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
